PhD studies

I am looking to take on PhD students with a common interest in memory and/or decision-making, a solid background in cognitive psychology or a related discipline, and a genuine interest in research (including learning new skills such as programming). Funding is available to domestic students via Australian Postgraduate Awards and University Postgraduate Awards funded by the Australian Government or UWA, and the University makes available additional scholarships bequeathed by benefactors. Excellent international students also have a number of ways of obtaining funding.

If you are interested, get in touch. Note that I will not reply to form letters or obvious cases of mass emailing.
